GSD.description:
drm/amdgpu/ucode: Remove firmware load type check in amdgpu_ucode_free_bo

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit b305469ed00420e53c66064b554531d6fbd98d5b. For more details please see the references link.
